summary: A mod that changes some attributes of spells
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This is a small mod that changes the cost, length, and power of a few spells

The specifics are:

[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Cost[/size]
[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[size=4]Mage-Flesh:[/size]

Oak-Flesh: 50 Base Mana

Stone-Flesh: 100 Base Mana

Iron-Flesh: 150 Base Mana

Ebony-Flesh: 200 Base Mana

Dragon-Hide: 250 Base Mana


[size=4]Wards:[/size]

Lesser Ward: 10 Base Mana

Stead-Fast Ward: 25 Base Mana

Greater Ward: 50 Base Mana


[size=4]Invisibility:[/size] 250 Base Mana

[/font][left][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Duration[/size][size=4]
[/size]
[/font]
[/left][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Mage-Flesh:[/size] AllÂ 30 Minutes

[size=4]Invisibility:[/size] 2 Minutes

[/font][left][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Power[/size][/font]
[/left][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[size=4]Wards:[/size]

Lesser Ward: 50 Points

Stead-Fast Ward: 75 Points

Greater Ward: 100 Points


If you want me to do anything other spell leave a message
Thanks for checking out this mod![/font]
author: Shadowbandits
